multi_roblox.name: Allow multiple Roblox instances
multi_roblox.description: Allow multiple Roblox instances to run at the same time

eurotrucks.name: NVIDIA Game Filter
eurotrucks.description: Enables the use of NVIDIA Game Filter by renaming RobloxPlayerBeta.exe (Supported graphics card required)

discord_rpc.name: Discord RPC
discord_rpc.description: Replace the default Discord RPC to show more details

activity_joining.name: Activity Joining
activity_joining.description: Allow anyone to join your game through Discord

show_user_profile_in_rpc.name: Show avatar in RPC
show_user_profile_in_rpc.description: Shows your Roblox avatar in your Discord RPC

bloxstrap_rpc.name: Bloxstrap RPC
bloxstrap_rpc.description: Allow games to set a custom RPC status using the BloxstrapRPC SDK
